description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Panzer General is back with an all-new turn-based strategy game! For the first time on Xbox Live Arcade, recreate actual battles during the last phase of World War II and experience the dramatic events of D-Day as they unfold in your hands. Build, customize, and fight with your personalized deck of 60 cards. Play with a friend in multiplayer mode and gain access to special units and cards. Download it now! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Panzer General combines the best of an online collectible card game with the action of a turn-based strategy game, all for the first time on Xbox Live Arcade. Panzer General casts you as a General in the Allied Forces during the final phase of World War II as you push through the Axis strongholds in Europe all the way to Berlin.
